org.kquiet.jobscheduler

Class JobBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kquiet.jobscheduler.JobBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestartBrowser

    public abstract class JobBase
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class is the base of all jobs. Each job class should extend this class and provide their own implementation.
    Author:
    Kimberly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobBase()
      Create a new job with randomly generated name.
      JobBase(String jobName)
      Create a new job with specified name.

      • pauseInternalBrowser

        protected final void pauseInternalBrowser()
        Pause the execution of internal browser. All executing browser tasks will remain running until they complete.
